title: Tirofiban prevents the effects of SARS-CoV-2 spike protein on macrophage activation and endothelial cell death
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Laura Marrone, Simona Romano, Michele Albanese, Salvatore Giordano, Alberto Morello, Michele Cimmino, Valeria Di Giacomo, Chiara Malasomma, Maria Fiammetta Romano, Nicola Corcione
